metadata.name: i fall asleep
metadata.description:
I am not alive
I just survive
I fall asleep
For years and years

"i fall asleep" was written and painted about my grandmother and the idea of life after death. No one knows where we go when we die but I like to imagine it's somewhere blue, and vast, and beautiful. 

Owner will optionally receive a .WAV of the full version of "i fall asleep" (4:02 minutes) and the physical painting, hand-signed.

Painting
16 x 20 inches
Acrylic, Oil Pastel, and Mixed Media on Canvas

NFT
2048 x 2048 pixels
1/1
